    Litter Size

    Rep_littersize.Rd

    Make a data frame of litter size per parent and birth date and produce summary tables of litter size. it selects only offspring/mother couples

    Rep_littersize(
  Reprodata,
  perAge = FALSE,
  Nday = 7,
  parentProb = 80,
  minNlitter = 30
)

    Arguments

    Reprodata

    data frame including at least the columns AnimalAnonID, ParentAnonID, ParentType, Probability, Offspring_BirthDate, Offspring_Inst and Parent_Age

    perAge

    logical Whether to estimate litter size per mother age. Default = FALSE

    Nday

    numeric Number of consecutive days over which the birth dates of a litter/clutch can be spread. Default = 7

    parentProb

    numeric Minimum percentage of parentage probability to include. Default = 80

    minNlitter

    numeric Minimum number of litters to run the analysis. The data frame for litter size will be produced in all cases. Default = 30

    Value

    A list including:

    • A data frame with the litter size per mother and birth date

    • A table including the number and proportion of each size of litter

    • Summary statistics including:

    • NOffsp_prob: Number of offspring

    • NParent_prob: Number of parents

    • NReprEvent: Number of litters

    • MeanLittSize: Mean litter size

    • MedLittSize: Median litter size

    • SdLittSize: Standard deviation of litter size

    • analyzed = FALSE,

    • error: if the litter size where not analysze, the associated error is printed here. It can be :"No births with parentage probability higher than parentProb or N litter < minNlitter

    • Nerr: The number id of the error

    • if perAge = TRUE, a table including the mean and standard deviation of litter size per maternal age

    Examples

    data(core)
data(collection)
data(parent)
data(moves)
#prepare Data
Data <- Rep_prepdata (coresubset = core, collection, parent, moves, minNrep = 1, minNparep = 1,
                      BirthType_parent = "All", BirthType_offspring = "All" )

#Estimate litter size
out <- Rep_littersize(Data$Reprodata, perAge = FALSE,
                      Nday = 7)

out
#> $summary
#> $summary$NOffsp_prob
#> [1] 6
#> 
#> $summary$NParent_prob
#> [1] 4
#> 
#> $summary$NReprEvent
#> NULL
#> 
#> $summary$analyzed
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $summary$error
#> N litter < 30
#> 
#> $summary$Nerr
#> [1] 5
#> 
#> $summary$MeanLittSize
#> NULL
#> 
#> $summary$MedLittSize
#> NULL
#> 
#> $summary$SdLittSize
#> NULL
#> 
#>

#> 5      4224544            114122          1 2002-06-22
